nodes.bodyText: This should be used by the line right below it.
Never mind, I see what you mean.

You only need to make the determination that the deposit is staff only once, i'd suggest checking this before line 54 Model model = getWritableModel(); and doing an early return if not staff only.
Alternatively, you could remove the check since the check is (trying to) happen in the DepositSupervisor.
Remove this, you are already creating the job further down and this conditional will always be false

This job needs to happen before IngestContentObjectsJob, otherwise the patron roles won't be ingested into fedora. I'd prefer if it happened before IngestDepositRecordJob as well, so that all the modification jobs happen before the ingest jobs start

you don't need any of the storage location related stuff in this test since the job doesn't interact with the binaries. So you can remove all the variables below this line, and the constants that go with them.

i know this is test data, but a folder isn't allow to have a primaryObject. You could remove this property, or make objBag into a work. Also, the child could be any type, it being a file with a storage location isn't necessary for this test.
Revert the changes in this file, this only needs to be a deposit status field
Revert the changes in this file, this only needs to be a deposit status field
Won't this selector find all the input elements on the page now?
No, it just finds all the checkboxes in the selected row
maybe i'm misunderstanding, but i thought jquery would use the whole document as the context for a lookup if you don't specify a context. Is it somehow inheriting a context?
Were all the changes in this file just formatting changes? I'm not actually seeing a checkbox for making something private here or when i run the branch
